Description: Create a storm of electrified mud, wind, and water that traps and shocks enemies.
Summon a tsunami driven by wind and lightning, crashing down with the force of an earthquake.
Call forth a storm from the depths, combining the power of water, earth, air, and lightning to devastate foes.
Turn the ground into electrified quicksand, trapping and shocking all caught within.
Unleash the ultimate force of water, earth, air, and lightning to completely annihilate the battlefield.
